Description.Text: The Hotel Bellagio is not a wellness spa center, but provides the opportunity on demand for a personal masseur and personalized treatments for real relaxing hammam bath in the heart of old town.

Hotel is located in a medieval small quiet street, 20 meters from the local market and not far from the beach. The Castle of Fortezza, the Venetian port, the museum,the bus station to Heraklion and Chania, taxi, City center and night life is about 10 minutes
